data.title: Kindness Launches Sunscreens for Every Lifestyle Need
data.description: Kindness, a Thai beauty brand founded by two visionary entrepreneurs, has unveiled three new Freedom Sunscreen formulas to meet the rising demand for health-conscious, eco-friendly beauty solutions. Known for their Clean Beauty ethos, Kindness products are crafted using advanced innovation to create skincare that is safe, free from irritants, and suitable for sensitive skin, addressing a variety of skincare needs.

data.title: Bangkok's Beloved Street Food Festival Returns Riverside
data.description: In a delightful blend of street food culture and riverside glamour, the 21st edition of "Raan Dung Ross Ded" transforms Shangri-La Bangkok

data.title: Bangchak Supports Thailand National Junior Tennis Athlete
data.description: Gloyta Nathalang, Senior Executive Vice President of Bangchak Corporation Public Company Limited, welcomed 13-year-old “Lookkid” Phasin Sinchalong, a member of the Thailand National Junior Tennis team. Currently residing in France, Lookkid is training at the Mouratoglou Tennis Academy.

data.title: Haus Da Lat: An Aspiration to Craft a Global Destination with Legendary Worldwide Brands
data.description: DA LAT, Vietnam - Long celebrated for its temperate climate, striking architecture, and lush natural landscapes, Da Lat has taken a bold step toward global prominence with Haus Da Lat, the country

data.title: Crimson Education: Empowering Thai Students, 9X Higher Chance of Global Top University Admissions
data.description: In today

data.title: Silver Lining Lounge Reopens with Panoramic Views and Elegance
data.description: Skyview Hotel Bangkok proudly announces the grand reopening of its Silver Lining Lounge, an elevated space for social and corporate events, perched on the 33rd floor with breathtaking views of Bangkok’s skyline and Benjasiri Park.

data.title: IRPC Explores Trade and Tech War Impacts in Special Forum
data.description: IRPC Public Company Limited (IRPC) recently held a high-profile hybrid forum titled  “Direction of Trade War and Tech War after the New U.S. Government” , bringing together distinguished experts and key industry leaders to provide critical insights into the evolving global economic landscape.

data.title: Exclusive Enrollment Opportunity at Brighton College Bangkok, Vibhavadi
data.description: As part of our launch celebration for the new    Vibhavadi campus , Brighton College Bangkok is delighted to offer an exclusive opportunity for pupils joining our vibrant educational community.

data.title: NT and Megabangna Collaborate for Mega Countdown Concert
data.description: National Telecom Public Company Limited (NT), in partnership with Megabangna Shopping Centre, is set to create an extraordinary end-of-year celebration with the highly anticipated  “NT PRESENTS MEGA COUNTDOWN 2025” . The event promises to deliver an unforgettable evening of music, entertainment, and joy under the theme  “A Sonic Journey into Mega Pop City” .

data.title: Chaumet Shines Bright at ICONSIAM Grand Opening
data.description: Chaumet officially unveiled its first boutique in Thailand at ICONSIAM with a spectacular Grand Opening ceremony, marking a significant milestone for the esteemed Maison in the Asia-Pacific region.

data.title: Dow Leads Mangrove Cleanup, Recycling Over 2.2 Tonnes
data.description: Dow Thailand Group has once again demonstrated its commitment to sustainability with its second annual "Save the Mangroves, Reduce Waste" campaign. The initiative, conducted in collaboration with the Thailand Mangrove Alliance and the Department of Marine and Coastal Resources, brought together government agencies, employees, and over 400 community volunteers to restore mangroves in Rayong Province.

data.title: Thaioil Wins Sustainability Disclosure Award for Sixth Year
data.description: Thai Oil Public Company Limited was recently honoured with the "Sustainability Disclosure Award 2024 – Award of Honour" for the sixth consecutive year. The award ceremony, hosted by the Thaipat Institute, was held at the Auditorium of the Bangkok Art and Culture Centre.

data.title: Krungsri, MUFG Boost Regional Growth with ASEAN Link
data.description: Bank of Ayudhya (Krungsri), in partnership with parent company Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group (MUFG) and other regional partner banks, is supporting customers’ business expansion across Southeast Asia to capitalise on the region’s robust growth potential.

data.title: AIA Hosts AIA One Billion Trail 2024 in Chiang Mai
data.description: AIA Thailand continues to champion healthier and more sustainable lifestyles for Thais and people in Asia Pacific by hosting the AIA One Billion Trail 2024, a four-person team trail run, now in its third consecutive year. The event was held along the beautiful natural route from Doi Inthanon to Doi Suthep in Chiang Mai, with race categories of 100, 50, 25, and 10 kilometres, during 22-24 November 2024. This year’s race saw the participation of 300 teams, who not only joined the trail run but also collectively raised funds for the Thai Red Cross Society, contributing to the Thai language literacy project with already over 10 million baht raised over the past three years. This event embodies the mission of AIA One Billion, AIA’s commitment to supporting healthier lives throughout the Asia Pacific region.

data.title: UOB and President Bakery Unite for Sustainability
data.description: UOB Thailand has announced a collaboration with President Bakery Public Company Limited, a leading bakery manufacturer and distributor in Thailand, to participate in UOB’s Green Term Deposit initiative. This partnership underscores President Bakery’s commitment to environmental sustainability within the food and beverage industry, marking a meaningful step toward its long-term sustainability goal.

data.title: L'Oréal Achieves 100% Renewable Energy Across SAPMENA
data.description: L’Oréal Achieves 100% Renewable Energy Across SAPMENA Zone

data.title: UNHCR supports Thailand in making statelessness history
data.description: Building on the recent resolution by the Thai Cabinet to accelerate a pathway to nationality for nearly half a million stateless people, the Royal Thai Government (RTG) today reaffirmed its commitment to make statelessness in Thailand a thing of the past. At an event in Bangkok coordinated between the Royal Thai Government and UNHCR,    the UN Refugee Agency, senior Thai officials shared Thailand’s bold vision on how to empower close to half a million people who are currently stateless to become productive Thai nationals.

data.title: C.P. Group Launches Corn Traceability System in Myanmar
data.description: C.P. Group, through its subsidiaries Charoen Pokphand Produce Co., Ltd. (CPP) and Bangkok Produce PLC (BKP), is taking bold steps to address environmental and supply chain challenges in Myanmar. Partnering with the Myanmar Corn Industrial Association (MCIA), the company has launched a state-of-the-art traceability system for the country’s corn supply chain, employing satellite imagery and blockchain technology.

data.title: Bangkok’s Identity Transformed at Future Lab 4
data.description: Siam Discovery – The Exploratorium, renowned as a hub for lifestyle experimentation, invites Bangkokians and visitors to reimagine the city’s identity through the groundbreaking project, Future Lab Volume 4: Design Culture. Running from 27 November 2024 to January 2025, the event takes place at two prominent venues: the Pathumwan Intersection Skywalk and the M Floor of Siam Discovery.

data.title: BONAVENTURA Brings Italian Elegance to CentralWorld
data.description: Explore timeless leather designs at BONAVENTURA’s first Thailand Pop-Up Store, open until 31 January 2025.

data.title: Bangchak Hosts 14th Greenovative Forum on AI and Sustainability
data.description: Bangchak Corporation Public Company Limited, in collaboration with The Standard news agency, hosted the 14th Greenovative Forum under the theme “Crafting Tomorrow’s Future with Sustainable Energy and AI” at True Digital Park West. Marking Bangchak’s 40th anniversary, the event brought together over 600 attendees, including local and international experts, to discuss the pivotal role of artificial intelligence (AI) in advancing sustainable energy, societal progress, and environmental solutions.

data.title: Blue by Alain Ducasse Celebrates Fifth Consecutive Year with Michelin
data.description: Bangkok, November 2024 – Blue by Alain Ducasse, Bangkok

data.title: Reflect on a Decade with Sundae Kids
data.description: River City Bangkok has proudly unveiled “Sundae Kids: 10 Years of Lost and Found,” a heartfelt anniversary exhibition celebrating a decade of the renowned duo’s artistic evolution. Launched on November 27, 2024, this immersive showcase invites visitors to reflect on their own journeys, exploring profound questions such as:

data.title: Experience Taiwan’s Culinary Treasures at TAIWAN SELECT Lounge
data.description: The TAIWAN SELECT LOUNGE at Taiwan Expo 2024, hosted by Taiwan’s Ministry of Economic Affairs (MOEA), showcases Taiwan’s rich culinary heritage and regional flavours. Located at Booth No. 547 in Hall 5 of the Queen Sirikit National Convention Centre, the Lounge features a selection of specialities from Taiwan’s diverse regions, offering visitors an opportunity to explore the country’s culture through cherished foods such as pineapple cakes, oolong tea, mochi, and more.

data.title: Thai Wah and Fuji Nihon Unite for Agri-Food Innovation
data.description: Thai Wah Public Company Limited (TWPC), a leader in the agri-food industry, has partnered with Japan’s Fuji Nihon Corporation (FNC) to form a strategic joint venture. This collaboration will focus on the manufacturing, sales, and distribution of tapioca starch and related products, cementing their positions as innovators in the food ingredients sector.

data.title: Discover Global Flavours at The Mall Food Expo
data.description: The Mall Lifestore, in collaboration with the Ministry of Commerce, the Rice Department, the Ministry of Agriculture and Cooperatives, Thai Life Insurance Public Company Limited, and Thai Namthip Corporation Limited, presents “The Mall Lifestore Food Expo” under the theme “The Rice Journey.” This unique event showcases international culinary creations using rice varieties from around the world, complemented by special dishes crafted by Thailand’s top chefs and a rice innovation exhibition by the Rice Department.

data.title: IRPC Hosts Deputy PM at Rayong Oil Refinery
data.description: Pirapan Salirathavibhaga, Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Energy, along with Sarawut Kaewtathip, Director-General of the Department of Energy Business, and Triphob Wongtrirat, Governor of Rayong, were warmly welcomed by Lersak Thongruang, Senior Executive Vice President of Operations, and Wanida Utaisomnapa, Senior Executive Vice President of Corporate Commercial and Marketing, during a visit to IRPC’s oil refinery in Rayong.

data.title: NT Showcases Digital Solutions at DigiTech ASEAN 2024
data.description: National Telecom Public Company Limited (NT) is committed to advancing the technology and digital industry by offering a comprehensive range of digital solutions designed to meet the diverse needs of businesses. The company participated in  DigiTech ASEAN Thailand 2024,  an ASEAN technology and digital exhibition and seminar held from  20–22 November 2024 at Hall 6, IMPACT Exhibition and Convention Centre,  Muang Thong Thani. The event facilitated industry and business sectors in addressing challenges associated with digital transformation.

data.title: Baxter Wins AMCHAM Awards for Sustainability in Dialysis
data.description: The American Chamber of Commerce (AMCHAM) has recognised Baxter Kidney Care (Vantive) for its Green Nephrology Project and the new Jom Recycle project that reduce plastic waste from dialysis.
